testcase.classname: As a store manager and sales manager, I should be able to add an event
testcase.name: Log in as a sales manager
testcase.system-out: When The user logs in as "sales manager"....................................passed And The user navigates to Dashboard Fleet-Vehicle page......................passed And User can click on any row in the table..................................passed And user can click add event button.........................................passed And user should be able to see add event pop up.............................passed And User enters event title.................................................passed And User can mark the event with any color..................................passed And User can click All-day event check box.................................passed And Time boxes will disappear...............................................passed And user clicks repeat button...............................................passed And user sees repeats dropdown menu.........................................passed And user can repeat action by selecting Daily,Weekly,Montly and Yearly......passed And user should see ending options as never, after,and by should be clickable.passed Then All Users can see all events on the General information page...........passed
